Package com.aestus.api.attachment.service

Interface AttachmentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AttachmentServiceImpl
public interface AttachmentService
The AttachmentService interface provides access to application functionality and features for file attachments . It acts as a proxy or endpoint to the service. The specific implementation can be found in the AttachmentServiceImpl class in the impl package.
